reviews.text:
The place is so serene. Providing commodities to bring Muslim around Kuching together in comfort for prayers and moment to rest for those in need.
-
It's not a big as Masjid Jamek, but what makes it comfortable to pray is that it's kinda quiet. More khusyuk. Got old graves there tho😃😃
The best place for Muslim islam people praying

reviews.author_name: Wan Abd Rahman Wan Abu Bakar
reviews.text: One of the Icon Mosque in kuching City located at the waterfront.  A must to pray to get the experience  if you happen to visit kuching

One of the oldest state mosque in Kuching. Located on the hill at the banks of Sarawak River. 
The most prominent object that decorate and lighted the interior space is the large chandlier. Newly carpeted flooring and the walls are fixed with colourful tile and mosaic.
The mosque is fully air-conditioned with clean ambience thus giving comfortable feelings to worshipers to perform their prayers. 
The toilets and ablutions section are clean. The only constrains is the parking areas. During Friday prayers normally owners parked their vehicles at the roadside or paid parking spaces provided by the City Council.

If you have small kids, I guess this would be a great place to go for family night out. Family-friendly environment. 
I haven't tried all the stalls, but the couple few I have tried are average. Don't expect too much with the food experience.
Wide range of food choices offered. From local cuisine to western cuisine and loved eating ABC here. So good!

Full of people during weekends. Go early morning so you can get he freshly seafood available and fruits are abundant..

Lock your car and make sure dont leave your valuable belongings in it.
Places to get fresh produce.. Good value for money.

Nothing much to do here, they have vendors selling clothes and souvenirs. You may walk a bit further to Satok Market to buy fresh, salted “Ikan Terubok” (RM10 per fish) and RM5-10 (for dried ones). They also help to pack neatly for you to bring on-board on flights.
Good food

The food is horrible! I rarely reviewed on food but this is disastrous. Fish is not fresh at all, the vegetables are so hard to chew, nothing went right on the table. And for that price, i would rather not eat seafood at all. Overpriced for food of no standard. Gosh!
Food not nice n yet expensive
Excellent ala carte menu
Nice seafood restaurant for family..

Great place for group, dates, solo hangout. The food was great. The drinks was great. Great selection of drinks. Prices can range from Rm10-300. Take your pic. Very enjoyable place. The band tonight was awesome! The singers was lit! Very recommend to go for a night out.

Took a while until I got a menu, staff was walking past me a lot and looking at me but not doing anything, made me feel a bit weird coming there alone. Once I was able to order it was all good. The pizza was awesome!
What can i say except this place is perfect & the service is excellent. Came here countless of times. Now let's talk about the food...yes the food...they are superb!!! 😊 worth every cent
nothing much, just good vibes good songs and etc ....

5 stars for the food, 0 star for the service. The food was extremely good and the ambience is just perfect for any occasion. We came here for my mum’s birthday celebration. However, your stuffs’ attitude was terribly bad, one of the stuffs showed unwillingness and impatience when we asked her to take photos for us. That spoiled the whole dining experience tonight. As a restaurant with reputations, you should have trained your stuffs better. We customers pay for the food as well as the service that you provide, if your stuff is unwilling to serve the customers with an open heart, then she should stay out from the service line. What’s worser than horrible food? Horrible service. I would love to come back again for the food, but you don’t deserve a second chance if your stuff’s attitude remains the same.

Great place for group, dates, solo hangout. The food was great. The drinks was great. Great selection of drinks. Prices can range from Rm10-300. Take your pic. Very enjoyable place. The band tonight was awesome! The singers was lit! Very recommend to go for a night out.

The atmosphere in this restaurant is calm and relaxing. Foods are great. A bit pricey but worth it. It is inside Merdeka Palace, Ground floor.
The food is ok, I would think Bella Italia @ RH serves more authentic and tasty Italian food.
the only one n the best italian food so far
Ambiance Cosy...food nice. But interior deco is a bit run down and very much old school.
Good services and nice food
